name: Offline Forever TRIAL
description:
Offline Forever

Offline TV, the ever popular content creators have moved into a new house!

But what happened that lead them to all disappear?

As a fan, it's up to you to find out!

An RPG horror with turnbased tactics like pokemon! Work your way through the OTV house and discover the secrets of their disappearance and try your best to save them (whether they are still human or not...)

If you wanna donate or support me in any way,  Ko-fi.com/lonesomeoni to buy me coffee to stay awake lol
